forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers this evening. Then becoming mostly cloudy overnight. Thunder possible. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Saturday
